view

Class FunnoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • view.FunnoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class FunnoteView
extends javafx.application.Application
implements java.util.Observer
    This is the main class that displays everything on the screen. It will update the controller when any changes are made by the user
    Author:
    Michael Tuohy, Trevor Freudig, Alexander Thompson, Scott LaFerriere

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void changeTop()
      This method switches the order of the Canvas and Pane on the StackPane in order to write text on Pane versus drawing on Canvas
      private void createDrawToolBar()
      This method generates the tool bar where the user can change the size of the font, the color of the font, the pen size, and the pen color.
      private void createMenuBar()
      This method creates the menu bar for the main stage/scene as well as contains all the event handlers for creating and saving new Pages/Sections/Notebooks
      private void createTextToolBar()
      This method generates the tool bar where the user can change the size of the font, the color of the font, the pen size, and the pen color.
      private void createVbox()
      This method generates the vbox on the left side of the screen that contains information regarding the current notebook, sections, and pages.
      private void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      This method sets the fill and the stroke of the paint object based on what is in the selection box.
      private void drawShape(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc, double startX, double startY, double endX, double endY)
      This method draws the user selected shape (Rectangle or Oval) based on the the coordinates of the mouse Event handler
      private void getTextColor()
      This method sets the color of the text based on the user's selection editingText
      private void showInvalidNotebookFileAlert()
      This method alerts the user if the desired Directory is in the right format
      void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      This method is called by FunNote.java and initializes the main window/canvas.
      void update(java.util.Observable obs, java.lang.Object obj)
      Required update method for the observer/observable design pattern.

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is called by FunNote.java and initializes the main window/canvas. This method "starts" the program.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
                   java.lang.Object obj)
        Required update method for the observer/observable design pattern. When updating, it clears the canvas by drawing a full white rectangle as well as clears all Text from the Pane
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer

                       double startX,
                       double startY,
                       double endX,
                       double endY)
        This method draws the user selected shape (Rectangle or Oval) based on the the coordinates of the mouse Event handler
        Parameters:
        gc - GraphicsContext of canvas
        startX- - starting X-coordinate
        startY- - starting Y-coordinate
        endX- - ending X-coordinate
        endY- - ending Y-coordinate

      • createVbox

        private void createVbox()
                 throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        This method generates the vbox on the left side of the screen that contains information regarding the current notebook, sections, and pages. From this vbox the user can change the notebook, section, and page.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • createMenuBar

        private void createMenuBar()
        This method creates the menu bar for the main stage/scene as well as contains all the event handlers for creating and saving new Pages/Sections/Notebooks

      • showInvalidNotebookFileAlert

        private void showInvalidNotebookFileAlert()
        This method alerts the user if the desired Directory is in the right format

      • createTextToolBar

        private void createTextToolBar()
        This method generates the tool bar where the user can change the size of the font, the color of the font, the pen size, and the pen color. This method also handles all of the change listeners associated with each of the options.

      • createDrawToolBar

        private void createDrawToolBar()
        This method generates the tool bar where the user can change the size of the font, the color of the font, the pen size, and the pen color. This method also handles all of the change listeners associated with each of the options.
